Package ca.yapper.yapperapp.OrganizerFragments

Class OrganizerCreateEditEventFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
ca.yapper.yapperapp.OrganizerFragments.OrganizerCreateEditEventFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class OrganizerCreateEditEventFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
OrganizerCreateEditEventFragment provides a form for organizers to create a new event. It allows organizers to specify event details, including name, facility, date, capacity, and geolocation options, and saves the event to Firestore.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class androidx.fragment.app.Fragment

    androidx.fragment.app.Fragment.InstantiationException, androidx.fragment.app.Fragment.SavedState
